description: A demon from the demon-realm who unwillingly helps Münchhausen II through a contract. In the past he fell deeply in love with the Beast-woman Megumi Amano and was banished from the realm for over 100 years, he still harbors feelings for her. [spoiler="In the end he tries to stop Münchhausen II because of his feelings for Megumi but is thwarted and brainwashed into fighting. "][/spoiler]
name: Kohoki
